#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
class compare
{
public:
	bool operator ()(ll a,ll b)
	{
		return a>b;
	}

};
priority_queue<ll,vector<ll>,compare>q;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,n,k,temp,p;
	ll a,ans;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(j=1;j<=t;j++)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a);
			q.push(a);
		}
		ans=0;
		while((q.size()-1)%(k-1)!=0)
		{
			q.push(0);
		}
		while(q.size()>1)
		{
			temp=k;
			a=0;
			for(p=0;p<k;p++)
			{
				a+=q.top();
				q.pop();
			}
			ans+=a;
			q.push(a);
		}
		while(!q.empty())
		{
			q.pop();
		}
		printf("Case %d: %lld\n",j,ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
